backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining SurgeryCase, Task, and UserProfile types with CRUD operations for cases, user profiles, and OpenAI config; includes authorization mixins and access control for admin/user permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three PDF export features: adding a PDF export button to the dashboard, formatting the PDF with all case fields, and including incomplete tasks in the PDF report.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend TypeScript/React files covering authentication, case management, CSV import/export, search/filter, validation, task checklists, and UI components with detailed implementation notes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, borders, and component-specific tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA manifest, favicons, theme color, and viewport meta tags for the SurgiPaw application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and standalone display mode for SurgiPaw veterinary surgery case tracker.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, precaching app shell, and skipping caching for Internet Identity and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow, view routing between dashboard/cases/settings, profile setup modal, admin access control, and navigation state including case highlighting and new case dialog triggers.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login/logout button component using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout and error handling for authentication state conflicts.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name on first login, preventing dismissal until profile is created.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines checklist items (discharge notes, labs, imaging, etc.) with their selection/completion states, default values, colors, and utility functions for filtering and counting tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Empty file placeholder for camera capture functionality.
Displays a surgery case card with editable notes, task checklist with color-coded badges, edit/delete actions, and confirmation dialogs.
Dialog for creating/editing surgery cases with fields for patient info, arrival date, species, breed, and AI-powered structured text parsing to auto-fill form fields.
Main list view component that displays filtered, sorted, and searchable surgery cases with controls for species/task filtering, CSV import/export, and case highlighting/scrolling.
Search input component with clear button for filtering cases by any field.
Dropdown select control for sorting cases by various criteria using predefined sort options.
Popover filter component for selecting multiple species with session storage persistence and active filter count badge.
A popover filter component that allows users to filter cases by task types and completion status, persisting selections to session storage.
A checklist component that displays task items with checkboxes, supporting both creation mode (selecting tasks) and completion mode (marking tasks complete), with color-coded borders.
A panel component providing CSV export and import functionality for surgery cases, with progress tracking, error handling, and support for both creating new cases and updating existing ones.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component with calendar picker that formats dates as MM/DD/YYYY, auto-inserts slashes during typing, validates input, and supports auto-advancing to the next field on completion.
Core CSV import/export logic that converts surgery cases to/from CSV format, validates data, parses fields, and matches imported records with existing cases by medical record number.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV schema with 17 columns for surgery case data, including headers, validation constants for species/sex/boolean values, and documentation of expected formats and field mappings.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides filtering functions for surgery cases by species, task types, and completion status. Includes logic to filter cases with incomplete tasks or exclude fully completed cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors (O/0, I/1/l confusion), and removing artifacts. Used as fallback for cleaning semi-structured AI responses.
Parses label:value formatted text into CaseFormData by matching field patterns and applying type-specific parsing (species, sex, dates). Serves as fallback for AI responses and Quick Fill feature.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates and downloads a CSV report of all surgery cases with remaining tasks. Includes CSV field escaping and timestamp-based filename generation.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting functions to convert Time (bigint nanoseconds) to MM/DD/YYYY strings and Species/Sex enums to readable text for CSV reports.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Implements case search functionality across basic fields (MRN, names, species, breed, etc.) and remaining checklist tasks. Returns filtered cases matching the query string.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options (arrival date, open tasks) and implements sorting logic for surgery cases. Includes helper to count remaining tasks per case.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines CaseFormData interface and constant arrays for species and sex options with their display labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation and parsing functions for case form fields including MRN, names, breed, species, sex, dates, and booleans with normalization and fuzzy matching logic.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard component that displays a filterable, searchable list of surgery cases with task status indicators, species badges, and navigation to individual cases. Includes PDF report generation and task filtering capabilities.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open tasks from surgery cases and calculate total open task counts across all cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Settings page component for configuring OpenAI API key with validation status display and secure input handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, automatically recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that debounces a changing value with configurable delay (default 500ms).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on surgery cases, user profiles, OpenAI config, and document analysis with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a light blue color scheme for the application, including specialized colors for patient names, species, complaints, and notes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name composition.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file for jspdf-autotable library (empty placeholder).
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file for jspdf library (empty placeholder).
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file defining types and interfaces for the Tesseract.js OCR library, including Worker, RecognizeResult, configuration options, and text recognition data structures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, typography plugin, animations, and design tokens for a component-based UI system.
project_state.json: Project metadata for SurgiPaw medical case management system, tracking features including PDF export functionality for cases with task tracking and case details.
